channel.title: Status on Super.NET Blog, Dawg
channel.description: Recent content in Status on Super.NET Blog, Dawg

item.title: Archiving This Project
item.author: run@superdotnet.run (Mike-EEE)
item.description: Greetings to the 20 hits-per-month that I get on this site, for whatever reason. ðŸ˜† Riding on the news of the previous update, I wanted to put some official finality on this project.

item.title: July 2019 Update: Pivoting onto Blazor
item.author: run@superdotnet.run (Mike-EEE)
item.description: I suppose we can call this the July and August update since it is so late in July. Serializer Last I checked in, I believe I was bragging over the work and direction of working on the serializer.

item.title: June 2019 Update
item.author: run@superdotnet.run (Mike-EEE)
item.description: It’s only been a few weeks since my last check-in. Hey, I’m getting pretty good at this. ðŸ˜† What’s Up Now, Doc? In my last update, I left you with the impression that I was working on the Super.

item.title: Super.NET V0.0.1
item.author: run@superdotnet.run (Mike-EEE)
item.description: Finally, Some Progress: v0.0.1 Today I am pleased to announce that Super.NET v0.0.1 is completed. While that might sound exciting, it actually means nothing. The v0.0.1 release is simply a foundational and framework release, intended to provide the core framework infrastructure to build components and supporting cast on top of it.

item.title: May 2019 Update
item.author: run@superdotnet.run (Mike-EEE)
item.description: OK! In my last update I mentioned how I was going to stop doing these. Guess that shows you to not pay attention to the things I say, huh. ðŸ˜†

item.title: Shut Up and Code
item.author: run@superdotnet.run (Mike-EEE)
item.description: Last month I updated with an idea that I had and said I would update here when done. Well not to be outdone by my own word – or, rather, neurotic tendencies ðŸ˜… – I am here with an update.

item.title: February / March 2019 Update
item.author: run@superdotnet.run (Mike-EEE)
item.description: Yeah yeah… I know last time that I said I wouldn’t do these any more, but I wanted to “check-in” and let you know that I am still alive and still have my heart set on this project, even if it’s already 3 months (!

item.title: January 2019 Update
item.author: run@superdotnet.run (Mike-EEE)
item.description: Welcome to another – and perhaps the last – installment of the “monthly” status updates here on Super.NET. Last month, I declared I would update here on the first Friday of every month.

item.title: December 2018 Update
item.author: run@superdotnet.run (Mike-EEE)
item.description: What’s Up Now, Dawg? Welcome to the December 2018 update of Super.NET. Going forward, I hope to have a monthly status report every first Friday of the month. What Got Done In a word, nothing.

item.title: October 2018 Update
item.author: run@superdotnet.run (Mike-EEE)
item.description: Alrighty, a little update here on what has been going on in my efforts here with Super.NET. Funding To start, things have finally settled down in the area of focus.
